title: Gas Trap
summaries: The Gas Trap is a trap item obtained by throwing a Whoopie Cushion into Shimmer. It can also be obtained from Chests in No traps and Get fixed boi worlds.

After being placed in a storage item, the Gas Trap will activate the next time that storage item is opened, dealing 20 / 40 / 60 damage to nearby players and 10 damage to nearby enemies, NPCs, and critters, and inflicting all entities within a small radius with Poisoned for 49 seconds / 1 minute 38 seconds / 2 minutes 3 seconds. The Gas Trap then becomes a Used Gas Trap, which has no effect and can be converted back to a Gas Trap by throwing it into Shimmer. Only one Gas Trap will be used at a time whenever a player opens a chest. A Gas Trap will not activate if the storage item it is in is opened on a singleplayer world and Autopause is on.
